mapper.sql: id, dcid, ocid, exchange_rate, status, month, created_user, created_time
mapper.select:
SELECT cr.id, CONCAT(REPLACE(cr.`month`,'-','年'),'月') monthStr, cr.`month`, cr.dcid, cr.ocid, c2.currency_name dCurrencyName, ci.currency_name oCurrencyName, cr.exchange_rate exchangeRate, cr.created_user createdUser, cr.created_time createdTimeStr FROM currency_rate cr LEFT JOIN currency_info ci ON cr.ocid = ci.id left join currency_info c2 on c2.id = cr.dcid where 1 = 1
and cr.month = #{form.month}

SELECT cr.exchange_rate exchangeRate FROM currency_rate cr WHERE cr.dcid = (select ci.id from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code = #{dCode}) and cr.ocid = (select c2.id from currency_info c2 where c2.currency_code = #{oCode}) and cr.`month` = DATE_FORMAT(now() , '%Y-%m' );
SELECT ci.currency_name currencyName FROM currency_info ci WHERE ci.currency_code = #{code}
